creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: multi-bright colors; horizontal bands of colorful designs: zigzags, diagonals, diamonds in pink, green, purple and orange; pieces joined at sides, center front and back using blocks of same colors; blue velvet edges; neck and arm openings with some metallic gold design cloth on neck and PR arm opening
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
